header.div: What will I learn in this set?

ol.li: watch examples of students answering questions about themselves in the first phase of the speaking test;
think about how to deal with difficult questions or when you are not sure about something;
learn what you should do in Phase 2 of the speaking test;
watch a candidate answering a Phase 2 task;
look at ways of making complex notes;
watch the examiner ask the candidate a follow up question.
